item.title: The Green Energy Fairy Tale is Real
item.description: For decades, we’ve been promised a utopian future powered by clean energy sources like solar, wind, and fusion. This ideal world, fueled by boundless energy, feels perpetually out of reach, forcing us to rely on polluting coal and oil. This is absurd. We possess the technology to transition away from fossil fuels immediately. Our obstacle isn’t technological, but mental. We cling to the misconception that clean energy is impractical, a belief so deeply rooted that we accept it without question.
